#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	char score[14];
	int over,run,wickets,players[12],player1,player2,onbat,nextplayer;
	bool allout;
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<12;i++)
		players[i]=0;
	cin>>over;
	player1=1,player2=2;
	onbat=1; nextplayer=3; wickets=0; allout=false;
	for(i=0;i<over;i++){
		scanf("\n%[^\n]s",score);
		for(j=0;j<12;j++){
			if(score[j]==' ')
				continue;
			if(score[j]=='\0')
				break;
			if(score[j]=='W'){
				if(player1==onbat){
					player1=nextplayer;
					onbat=player1;
				}
				else{
					player2=nextplayer;
					onbat=player2;
				}
				wickets++;
				nextplayer++;
				if(wickets==10){
					allout=true;
					break;
				}

			}
			else{
				run=score[j]-48;
				players[onbat]+=run;
				if(run&1){
					if(player1==onbat){
						onbat=player2;
					}
					else{
						onbat=player1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if(allout)
			break;
		if(player1==onbat){
			onbat=player2;
		}
		else{
			onbat=player1;
		}
	}
	if(wickets==10||score[j-2]=='W'||score[10]=='W'){
		nextplayer--;
	}
	for(i=1;i<nextplayer;i++)
		printf("Player %d %d\n",i,players[i]);
	return 0;
}
